   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to pymet's documentation!
=================================

This is the documentation for pymet. pymet is wrapper module for Numpy, Scipy and matplotlib
to use Meteorogical analysis and grid data.


References
===========

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1
   :titlesonly:

   pymet.dynamics
   pymet.grid
   pymet.stats
   pymet.tools
   pymet.io
   pymet.field
   pymet.metplt
